queries.insert:
insert into FE_EPWR_CHARGE_TIME /* 전기요금TIME테이블 */ ( INLO_NO /* 설치위치번호 */ , YYYYMMDDHH /* 년월일시 */ , USED_AMT /* 사용량(kWh) */ , EPWR_PRICE_ID /* 전기요금ID */ , USED_PRICE /* 사용단가 */ , USED_CHARGE /* 사용요금 */ , EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD /* 전력부하시간코드 */ , PEAK_USE_EPWR /* 최대사용젼력 */ , REG_USER_NO /* 등록사용자번호 */ , REG_DTM /* 등록일시 */ , CHG_USER_NO /* 수정사용자번호 */ , CHG_DTM /* 수정일시 */ ) with datas as ( select a.EPWR_PRICE_ID as EPWR_PRICE_ID /* 전기요금ID */ , a.EPWR_PRICE_NAME as EPWR_PRICE_NAME /* 전기요금명 */ , b.BASIC_PRICE as BASIC_PRICE /* 기본요금(원/kW) */ , c.DESCR as TMLOAD_DESCR /* 부하 */ , d.EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD as EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD /* 시간대부하코드 */ , ( select CD_NAME from FX_CO_CD d1 where d1.CD_CLASS = 'EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD' and d1.CD_CODE = d.EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD ) as EPWR_TM_LOAD_NM /* 시간대부하명 */ , d.PRICE as UNIT_PRICE /* 단가 */ , c.MMDD , c.HH from FE_EPWR_PRICE a , FE_EPWR_PRICE_BASE b , FE_EPWR_PRICE_TMLOAD c , FE_EPWR_PRICE_UNIT d where a.EPWR_PRICE_ID = b.EPWR_PRICE_ID and b.START_EFFCT_DATE <= $date and b.END_EFFCT_DATE >= $date and c.MMDD = concat(substr($date, 5, 2), '**') /* 7월. 일자가 적용되면 ** 자리에 일자 넣음 */ and c.START_EFFCT_DATE <= $date and c.END_EFFCT_DATE >= $date and d.EPWR_PRICE_ID = a.EPWR_PRICE_ID and d.MM = substr($date, 5, 2) /* 7월 */ and d.EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD in ( c.EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD, '0') /* 시간대 부하가 없으면 0으로 시간부하가 설정되어 있음 */ and d.START_EFFCT_DATE <= $date and d.END_EFFCT_DATE >= $date ) , a as ( select c.INLO_NO as INLO_NO , substr(b.ENG_DTM, 1, 10) as YYYYMMDDHH , b.CONS_AMT as USED_AMT , a.EPWR_PRICE_ID as EPWR_PRICE_ID , a.UNIT_PRICE as USED_PRICE , TRUNCATE(b.CONS_AMT * a.UNIT_PRICE, 1 ) as USED_CHARGE , a.EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD as EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD from datas a , FE_ENG_MEASR_AMT_INLO b , FE_EPWR_INLO_PRICE c where b.ENG_ID = 'E11' and b.ENG_DTM >= concat($date, '000000') and b.ENG_DTM <= concat($date, '235959') and b.DTM_TYPE = '1H' and c.INLO_NO = b.INLO_NO and a.EPWR_PRICE_ID = c.EPWR_PRICE_ID and substr(b.ENG_DTM, 9, 2) = a.HH ) -- 피크 전력량 가져옴. , b as ( select a.* , ( select max(t1.CONS_AMT) from FE_ENG_MEASR_AMT_INLO t1 where t1.ENG_DTM between CONCAT(a.YYYYMMDDHH, '0000') and CONCAT(a.YYYYMMDDHH, '5959') and t1.INLO_NO = a.INLO_NO and t1.ENG_ID = 'E11' and t1.DTM_TYPE = '15M' ) as PEAK_USE_EPWR , 1 as REG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as REG_DTM , 1 as CHG_USER_NO , DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') as CHG_DTM from a ) select * from b a
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE USED_AMT = a.USED_AMT , EPWR_PRICE_ID = a.EPWR_PRICE_ID , USED_PRICE = a.USED_PRICE , USED_CHARGE = a.USED_CHARGE , EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD = a.EPWR_TM_LOAD_CD , PEAK_USE_EPWR = a.PEAK_USE_EPWR
queries.update: update FE_EPWR_CHARGE_TIME a set PEAK_USE_DTM = ( select max(ENG_DTM) from FE_ENG_MEASR_AMT_INLO t1 where t1.ENG_DTM BETWEEN concat(a.YYYYMMDDHH, '0000') and concat(a.YYYYMMDDHH, '5959') and t1.DTM_TYPE = '15M' and t1.INLO_NO = a.INLO_NO and t1.ENG_ID = 'E11' and t1.CONS_AMT = a.PEAK_USE_EPWR ) , CHG_DTM = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') where a.YYYYMMDDHH between concat($date, '00') and concat($date, '23')
